author: Dr15Jones
body: This finishes the transformation began in #18751 by having the DQMEDHarvesters put a DQMToken into the LuminosityBlock once the module has finished. DQMRootOutputModule and MEtoEDMConverter both consume the DQMToken to guarantee proper run ordering of the modules.
title: Finish conversion of DQMEDHarvester to EDProducers
